title: Simulation/VR-Based Educational Programs for Remote Collaborative Science Learning

context.prior_knowledge: Basic Science Knowledge and Digital Device Proficiency
context.additional_context: Science learning integrating VR simulations and collaboration tools in smartphone-centric limited-technology environments

learning_goals: Learners can explain scientific problem-solving processes with peers using remote collaboration tools with over 80% accuracy.
Learners can analyze scientific experiment data in VR simulation environments and write collaborative reports.
Learners can complete team projects by applying digital collaboration protocols even in limited-technology environments.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
